00037 #include "egs_collimated_source.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_CollimatedSource::EGS_CollimatedSource(EGS_Input *input,
00041         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSimpleSource(input,f),
00042     source_shape(0), target_shape(0), dist(1), ctry(0) {
00043     EGS_Input *ishape = input->takeInputItem("source shape");
00044     if (ishape) {
00045         source_shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00046         delete ishape;
00047     }
00048     if (!source_shape) {
00049         string sname;
00050         int err = input->getInput("source shape name",sname);
00051         if (err)
00052             egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: missing/wrong inline source "
00053                        "shape definition and missing wrong 'source shape name' input\n");
00054         else {
00055             source_shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(sname);
00056             if (!source_shape)
00057                 egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: a shape named %s"
00058                            " does not exist\n",sname.c_str());
00059         }
00060     }
00061     ishape = input->takeInputItem("target shape");
00062     if (ishape) {
00063         target_shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00064         delete ishape;
00065     }
00066     if (!target_shape) {
00067         string sname;
00068         int err = input->getInput("target shape name",sname);
00069         if (err)
00070             egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: missing/wrong inline target"
00071                        "shape definition and missing wrong 'target shape name' input\n");
00072         else {
00073             target_shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(sname);
00074             if (!source_shape)
00075                 egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: a shape named %s"
00076                            " does not exist\n",sname.c_str());
00077         }
00078     }
00079     if (target_shape) {
00080         if (!target_shape->supportsDirectionMethod())
00081             egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: the target shape %s, which is"
00082                        " of type %s, does not support the getPointSourceDirection()"
00083                        " method\n",target_shape->getObjectName().c_str(),
00084                        target_shape->getObjectType().c_str());
00085     };
00086     EGS_Float auxd;
00087     int errd = input->getInput("distance",auxd);
00088     if (!errd) {
00089         dist = auxd;
00090     }
00091     setUp();
00092 }
00093 
00094 void EGS_CollimatedSource::setUp() {
00095     otype = "EGS_CollimatedSource";
00096     if (!isValid()) {
00097         description = "Invalid collimated source";
00098     }
00099     else {
00100         description = "Collimated source from a shape of type ";
00101         description += source_shape->getObjectType();
00102         description += " onto a shape of type ";
00103         description += target_shape->getObjectType();
00104         description += " with ";
00105         description += s->getType();
00106         if (q == -1) {
00107             description += ", electrons";
00108         }
00109         else if (q == 0) {
00110             description += ", photons";
00111         }
00112         else if (q == 1) {
00113             description += ", positrons";
00114         }
00115         else {
00116             description += ", unknown particle type";
00117         }
00118     }
00119 }

00121 extern "C" {
00122 
00123     EGS_COLLIMATED_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource *createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00124             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00125         return
00126             createSourceTemplate<EGS_CollimatedSource>(input,f,"collimated source");
00127     }
